Room.Name: Oceancrest Central Arena Reception Area
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large plaza at the center of the large arena complex.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Central Arena is divided into a number of smaller arenas and combat zones for the pleasure of the viewing audience. To the southeast is the Central Arena, where combatants engage strong opponents in hand-to-hand combat. The Central Arena is divided into many small areas of individual skill including a one-on-one combat arena. To the southwest are the Pits of Doom. The Pits are heavily guarded at all times and house a number of large dragons. To the north is the Game Arena, where combatants use wit and skill to eventually defeat the great Wizard of Kaldais.
